snippet.title: Color-A-Cube, Out Now For Free | Meta Horizon Store
snippet.description:
🎉 Color-A-Cube is Officially Out on the Meta Horizon Store! 🎉
We are proud to announce our newest game on the Meta Horizon Store, Color-A-Cube!
Color-A-Cube is our early access voxel coloring app. Download Now for free!

✨ Early Access!?
Yep! You read that right. While working on updates for BIG SHOTS, we learned how important it is to listen to your feedback. That was our biggest priority when deciding what to do next.

What does this mean for Color-A-Cube? We will be listening to your feedback and suggestions to see what we should add next. Is there a pack you think would be really fun to color or a feature that you think will make your experience better? Let us know! We want to make sure we do what’s best for our community!
